text: Ivana Lončarek (born 8 April 1991) is a Croatian athlete specialising in the sprint hurdles. She has personal bests of 13.09 seconds in the 100 metres hurdles (-0.3 m/s, Pitesti 2016) and 8.22 seconds in the 60 metres hurdles (Gothenburg 2013). ==International competitions== {| |-
